value:
$WmMPID_ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Normal,Face|Chrom, it's true that you saved me.$k$pHowever, you are not simply your
own man. If I win, you'll stop taking
any more foolish risks. Agreed?$k$p$WmMPID_ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Normal,Face|How did you and mother first meet?
If I manage to defeat you today, I'll
have you tell me!$k$p$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|You both seem even more
determined than usual. However,
I have no intention of losing!$k$p
